author: jeffbi

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body: How can I find what went wrong with the Travis CI build? It *looks* like it something failed on OS X, but I've been able to run the tests on Windows, Linux, and OS X without errors. The tests are skipped on non-Windows, but none fail.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: It looked like it didn't start. I restarted it to see if it'll run

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT, can you look at this when you have time?

title: Update Get-ComputerInfo test to properly test DeviceGuard items.
